channel.title: Making Npcs Agressive
channel.description:
How do you make a certain npc hit 30s and 40s etc and dont say npc.cfg cause that isnt it i know its in npchandler.java but i dont know where can anyone help
ok but if anyones gonna ask if i need to use the search forum dont ask cause i searched and it was a bunch people asking for help in addition i need help thanks
